participant_1.background:
I'm not really feeling up to going out, but I might take a walk on the beach by my house.
i love travelling and discovering new cultures.
i am studying software development.
I value my friends the most.
I love to go to the deli because I can get a sandwich that is both delicious and affordable.

participant_2.background:
My most valuable thing is my ability to stay humble, even in the face of great wealth.
i play bingo every wednesday with my husband.
i am a civil war reenactment participant.
yellow is my favorite color.
I am a creative person who enjoys making jewelry.

content.text: I'm doing well, thanks for asking! How about you?
I am doing well, too. What are you up to today?
Not much, just playing some bingo with my husband.
That sounds fun! I've never played bingo before.
It's a lot of fun, you should try it sometime!
I will! What else do you like to do for fun?
I like to make jewelry, and I'm also a civil war reenactment participant.
Those sound like fun hobbies! I've never made jewelry before, but I've always wanted to try.
It's a lot of fun, and it's a great way to express your creativity.
I might have to give it a try sometime! What kind of jewelry do you like to make?
I like to make all kinds of jewelry, but I especially like making necklaces and earrings.
Those are both beautiful pieces of jewelry! I love the colors and the design.
Thank you! I'm glad you like them.
Me too! I might have to make some jewelry of my own sometime
